name: The Bingo Association
goal:
The Bingo Association is the trade body for bingo operators in Great Britain, licensed under The Gambling Act 2005.

The Association's aim is to promote and develop the interests of ALL licensed bingo operators in Great Britain.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, Fraud prevention, Taxation
euInitiatives: ADR Directive, AML Directive, tax and information related matters
